functions.name: calculate_feedstock_cost_for_year
functions.description: Calculate the cost of a feedstock for a given year

cases.body: -(( price * plant_output_kg_per_year * inflation_price_increase_factor * percnt_var * start_time ) + ( price * plant_output_kg_per_year * inflation_price_increase_factor * (1 - start_time) ))

functions.name: get_feedstock_costs
functions.description: Calculate the cost of a feedstock over a range of years

functions.name: feedstock_prices_from_df
functions.description: For a given year (i), return price of each feedstock

functions.name: get_total_feedstock_costs
functions.description: Calculate the total cost of all feedstocks over a range of years
functions.lambda_map_arg_str: get(operation_range, year), sum_list(feedstock_prices_from_df(feedstock_price_df, year)), get(inflation_price_increase_factors, year), start_time, plant_output_kg_per_year, percnt_var
